statements: SELECT * FROM customer_segmentation_data WHERE age < 30
SELECT customer_name, gender, income FROM customer_segmentation_data WHERE income > 50000
SELECT segment, customer_name FROM customer_segmentation_data ORDER BY segment DESC
SELECT age, gender, income FROM customer_segmentation_data ORDER BY age ASC, income DESC
SELECT customer_id, customer_name, income FROM customer_segmentation_data
SELECT customer_id, customer_name, age, gender, income, segment FROM customer_segmentation_data WHERE age > 30 ORDER BY income DESC LIMIT 10
SELECT * FROM customer_segmentation_data WHERE gender = 'Male' ORDER BY customer_name ASC LIMIT 5
SELECT customer_id, customer_name, age, gender, income, segment FROM customer_segmentation_data WHERE income > 50000 ORDER BY age DESC LIMIT 5
SELECT customer_name, age, gender, income FROM customer_segmentation_data WHERE segment = 'VIP' ORDER BY age ASC LIMIT 3
SELECT customer_id, customer_name, gender FROM customer_segmentation_data WHERE age > 25 AND income BETWEEN 30000 AND 60000 ORDER BY customer_id ASC
SELECT * FROM customers WHERE customer_age > 30;
SELECT customer_name, customer_email FROM customers WHERE customer_id = 5;
SELECT customer_id, customer_name, customer_email FROM customers ORDER BY customer_name ASC;
SELECT * FROM customers WHERE customer_address LIKE '%Street%';
SELECT customer_id, customer_name, customer_email, customer_age FROM customers WHERE customer_age BETWEEN 25 AND 40;
SELECT * FROM customers WHERE customer_age > 30 ORDER BY customer_name DESC LIMIT 10;
SELECT customer_name, customer_email FROM customers WHERE customer_id = 5;

SELECT customer_name, customer_address, segment_name FROM customers JOIN customer_segments ON customers.customer_id = customer_segments.segment_id WHERE customer_age BETWEEN 25 AND 40 ORDER BY customer_age ASC;
SELECT customer_name, segment_name FROM customers LEFT JOIN customer_segments ON customers.customer_id = customer_segments.segment_id WHERE customer_name LIKE 'A%' AND segment_name IS NOT NULL;
SELECT customer_name, customer_address FROM customers WHERE customer_age < 25 OR customer_age > 50;
SELECT customer_id, age, gender, income FROM CustomerDemographics;
SELECT * FROM CustomerDemographics WHERE gender = 'Male';
SELECT customer_id, purchase_date, purchase_amount FROM PurchaseHistory ORDER BY purchase_date DESC;
SELECT customer_id, preference_1, preference_2, preference_3 FROM CustomerPreferences WHERE preference_1 = 'Outdoor';
SELECT customer_id, age, gender, income FROM CustomerDemographics WHERE age > 40 ORDER BY income DESC;
SELECT customer_id, age, gender, income FROM CustomerDemographics WHERE age > 30 ORDER BY income DESC;
SELECT customer_id, preference_1, preference_2 FROM CustomerPreferences WHERE preference_1 = 'Sports' AND preference_2 = 'Travel';
SELECT customer_id, purchase_date, purchase_amount FROM PurchaseHistory WHERE purchase_amount > 1000 ORDER BY purchase_date ASC;
SELECT customer_id, age, gender, income FROM CustomerDemographics WHERE age < 20 AND gender = 'Male';
SELECT customer_id, age, gender, income FROM CustomerDemographics WHERE income BETWEEN 50000.00 AND 100000.00 ORDER BY gender, age ASC;
SELECT * FROM customers;
SELECT customer_name, age FROM customers WHERE age > 30;
SELECT customer_name, order_date, order_total FROM customers JOIN orders ON customers.customer_id = orders.customer_id;
SELECT product_name, price FROM products WHERE category = 'Electronics';
SELECT segment_name, description FROM customer_segments ORDER BY segment_name DESC;
SELECT * FROM customers LIMIT 5;
SELECT customer_name, age FROM customers WHERE age > 30 ORDER BY age DESC;
SELECT product_name, price FROM products WHERE category = 'Electronics' ORDER BY price ASC;
SELECT order_id, order_date, order_total FROM orders WHERE order_date >= '2022-01-01' ORDER BY order_total DESC;
SELECT c.customer_name, o.order_date, p.product_name FROM customers c JOIN orders o ON c.customer_id = o.customer_id JOIN products p ON o.product_id = p.product_id WHERE c.customer_type = 'VIP';
SELECT * FROM customers;
SELECT customer_name, customer_age FROM customers WHERE customer_id = 1;
SELECT customer_name, customer_age, customer_gender FROM customers WHERE customer_age > 30 ORDER BY customer_name DESC;
SELECT customer_name, customer_age, customer_location FROM customers WHERE customer_gender = 'Female';
SELECT customer_name, customer_age, customer_gender, customer_location FROM customers WHERE customer_age > 25 AND customer_location LIKE '%York%' ORDER BY customer_age ASC;
SELECT * FROM customers ORDER BY customer_age DESC, customer_name ASC;
SELECT customer_name, customer_age FROM customers WHERE customer_gender = 'Male' OR customer_gender = 'Female';
SELECT customers.customer_name, purchases.purchase_amount FROM customers JOIN purchases ON customers.customer_id = purchases.customer_id WHERE purchases.purchase_amount > 1000;
SELECT segment_name, segment_description FROM customer_segments WHERE segment_description IS NOT NULL;
SELECT DISTINCT package_name, package_price FROM packages WHERE package_price < 50;
